recipe_name: Grilled broccoli with chilli soy dressing
author: Brian Turner
method: Heat a griddle pan until smoking, then drizzle the broccoli with the vegetable oil and add to the pan. Chargrill for 2-3 minutes, turning occasionally, or until the broccoli is golden-brown all over.  Combine the remaining ingredients in a small bowl for the dressing. Place the chargrilled broccoli on a serving plate and drizzle over the dressing. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 85g/3oz Tenderstem broccoli, blanched and drained,  1 tbsp vegetable oil,  2 tbsp soy sauce,  1 red chilli, chopped,  3 tbsp chopped fresh chervil,  1 tbsp sesame oil,  1 tbsp balsamic vinegar
